Name: Torch
About the game: GET READY FOR A WILD RIDE! Be brave young Player ! Push the door of the elemental dungeon and defeat your friends to survive! A crazy race with your friends Torch is a platform game where you have to jump and change elements to fit the dungeon platforms! This game allows you to play up to 4 players locally. Win the game by being faster and smarter than your opponents! A unique ascension Each new game, you will face a new tower to climb! Whether it be the type of platforms or their positions, nothing will ever be the same again... From heaven to hell The higher you climb in the dungeon, the more difficult it will become: the platforms will become less numerous, less large but also less immobile.... Only the most daring will triumph over hell... Controllers You can play in : solo mode with a controller or keyboard : get as high as you can local multiplayer mode with at least one controller + other controllers or keyboard : distance your opponent(s) to win the race !
